mapper.select: SELECT TEMP_CD , DEPT_NO , USER_ID , TEMP_NM , TEMP_DESC , TEMP_CONTENT , MERGY_ITEM , STATUS , (SELECT USER_NM FROM NEO_USER WHERE USER_ID = T1.REG_ID) AS REG_NM , (SELECT USER_NM FROM NEO_USER WHERE USER_ID = T1.UP_ID) AS UP_NM , REG_DT , UP_DT , ISNULL(T1.LEGAL_YN,'N') LEGAL_YN , ISNULL(T1.WEBLINK_YN,'N') WEBLINK_YN , SEG_NO , TEMP_MAPP_CONTENT , MAPP_TEMP_CD AS API_TEMP_CD FROM NEO_KAKAOTALK_TEMPLATE T1 WHERE TEMP_CD = #{tempCd}

SELECT X.MERGY_ITEM , Y.KAKAO_COL AS API_KAKAO_COL , Y.MERGE_COL AS API_MERGE_COL FROM NEO_KAKAOTALK_TEMPLATE X LEFT OUTER JOIN NEO_KAKAOTALK_TEMPLATE_MAPP Y ON ( X.TEMP_CD = Y.TEMP_CD ) WHERE X.TEMP_CD = #{tempCd}
